html.p: Here are some sites that have already started providing software via this system. If you find any more, write to the list to let us know and we will add them here.
If you're not sure how to run these programs, consult the injector installation instructions.

ul.li: rox.sf.net provides AddApp, Archive, Edit, MIME-Editor, Memo, OroboROX, ROX-Filer, ROX-Lib, ROX-Session, Resolution, and Wallpaper (http://rox.sourceforge.net/desktop/ZeroInstall).
kerofin.demon.co.uk provides Album, Depend, Desktop2App, DownloadManager, Fetch, Launch, Mail, NetStat, Thumbs, and VideoThumbnail (http://www.kerofin.demon.co.uk/2005/interfaces).
hayber.us provides Find, Menu, MusicBox, Ripper and Volume (http://hayber.us/0install/).
lgames.sourceforge.net provides a selection of classic games, including Barrage, LBreakout, LGeneral, LMarbles, Lpairs and Ltris.
user.cs.tu-berlin.de provides the Penguin-Command game (hosted on people.freenet.de).

html.p: If you want to make additional programs available this way, please read the packaging guide.
